text: K20JX-D is a low-power Class A television station in Sacramento, California, broadcasting locally in digital on UHF channel 20 and virtual channel 27 as an affiliate of 3ABN. Founded August 21, 1990, the station was owned by Abundant Life Broadcasting, Inc., which had sold it to Amazing Facts LLC. Amazing Facts sold it to HC2 Holdings in 2018.https://www.rbr.com/hc2s-amazing-golden- addition/Digital TV Market Listing for K20JX-D ==History== The station’s construction permit was initially issued on August 21, 1990 under the calls of K56EN. From 1993 until 2010, it used K27EU as its callsign. The current K20JX-D was assigned on November 8, 2010.http://www.fccinfo.com/CMDProEngine.php?sCurrentService=TV&tabSearchType;=Appl&sAppIDNumber;=334 ==Digital channels== {| class="wikitable" |- !
